pr_title: Issue #6104: fix GenericWhitespaceCheck for ctor calls

timeline.bodyText: Please mark these lines with the // violation comment.
timeline.author: pbludov

timeline.message: Issue #6104: fix GenericWhitespaceCheck for ctor calls

timeline.bodyText:
When is it not identifier?
And does this cover things like new OuterClass.InnerClass() or new package.Class().
timeline.author: rnveach

replies.bodyText: It is not identifier in cases like new ArrayList<String>()
replies.author: strkkk

replies.bodyText:
Done
I added test cases and code changes to detect static classes and package
replies.author: strkkk

timeline.bodyText:
Please remove upper comment completely.
It now becomes a bit misleading.
Please update doc https://checkstyle.org/config_whitespace.html#GenericWhitespace at description to make it
- should not be preceded with whitespace when it is precede method name or constructor
- should not be preceded with whitespace when following type name.

And
should be followed with whitespace in almost all cases, except diamond operators and when preceding method name or contructor.

Please add example of correct ctor to Examples with correct spacing: under example for method
timeline.author: romani
